## InputValidationErrorType type

Represents a standardized error format for input validation failures. Used when client input fails validation rules.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type InputValidationErrorType = {
  name: string;
  errors: {
    field?: string;
    messages: string[];
  }[];
};
```
